NAME: Rashi Kohli
ABOUT:
I am a qualified Chartered Accountant with experience in Risk Advisory, Statutory Audit, International Finance and Accounting. I'm currently associated with EY India as a Consultant is Risk Advisory Services.
I did 2 years of my articleship with KPMG in Assurance, and 12 months of Industrial Training with NTPC Limited in International Finance.

During my articleship, I worked with NTPC Limited as an Industrial Trainee in International Finance. My work mostly involves preparing monthly and quarterly debt service projections, updation of compliance documents with respect to listing requirements at the London Stock Exchange and Singapore Stock Exchange as well as routine work involving review of LCs, BGs and Bank Charges.
 
Prior to working with NTPC, I was associated with BBSR & Co. LLP (Network firm under KPMG) in the assurance division as a staff accountant. My role there involved assisting my seniors in timely completion of statutory audits. I have served as a part of audit team for major technology giants, industries in automobile sector, luxury hotels, small scale manufacturing entities as well as advertising agencies.

I also served as Article Trainee at Saxena and Saxena Chartered Accountants. I served as a part of the Internal Audit team for a 4 star hotel, managed various stock audits of companies engaged in trading of pharmaceuticals, aluminium flex, oils and electrical equipments.

I also worked as an Associate Content Writer for YOUth YOUniverse and the job involved putting my creative writing skills to use. I was required to write articles on anything and everything.
